page.title: 06THE FINZEAN WOMEN'S GUILD.
page.content: The Women's Guild, a{Church of} {Scotland}organisation,was formed in Finzean over 50 years ago and during that time has seen many changes. For a time there was both a Women's Guild and a{Young Wives'Group}but due to the shortage of members,these have now amalgamated.They hold six monthly meetings throughout the winter to which are invited speakers on a wide variety of subjects. At Christmas they organise an evening {Carol Singing}around the district when they are joined by others in the community. The Guild ladies organise Church fetes and cater for Church functions. On the Guild's{51st birthday}the Kirk Session took the ladies out to dinner, the 50th birthday having passed unnoticed!
